actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for the award of the Armed Forces Expeditionary Medal to members of the Armed Forces who participate in Operation Joint Endeavor or Operation Joint Guard in the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to designate participation in Operations Joint Endeavor or Joint Guard in Bosnia and Herzegovina as service that meets the general requirements for the award of the Armed Forces Expeditionary Medal. Requires the Secretary of the military department concerned to determine whether individual members of that military branch meet the individual service requirements for such award.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the award of the Armed Forces Expeditionary Medal to members of the Armed Forces who participate in Operation Joint Endeavor or Operation Joint Guard in the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina.
